snippet: The United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit upheld a decision giving five former New Orleans police officers a new trial in connection with deadly shootings of unarmed people after Hurricane Katrina.
abstract: US Court of Appeals upholds decision requiring new trial for five former New Orleans police officers involved in 2005 deadly shootings following Hurricane Katrina.
lead_paragraph: The United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit upheld a decision giving five former New Orleans police officers a new trial in connection with deadly shootings of unarmed people after Hurricane Katrina.

headline.main: Louisiana: New Trials Can Proceed for Ex-Officers
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: New Trials Can Proceed for Ex-Officers
